name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Textero AI: Your Personal AI-Powered Writing & Research Assistant

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Textero is an AI-powered writing assistant that helps you create high-quality content faster and easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Textero is an AI-powered writing assistant that helps you create high-quality content faster and easier. With Textero AI, you can get fresh ideas, find references, check grammar, summarize, and more—all for free.

With just a few clicks, you can turn your drafts into clear and well-structured texts, using tools to edit papers just inside the side panel of your browser. See what Textero can do for you:

➤ AI Research Assistant: Access a large database of academic references for trustworthy sources. 
➤ Essay Topic Finder: Easily generate engaging topics and research titles.
➤ Grammar Checker: Review your texts for grammatical errors and style improvements. 
➤ AI Summarizer: Extract main points and create summaries in seconds.
➤ Paraphraser: Use 7 paraphrasing modes to make your texts easier to read and free from plagiarism.
➤ Essay Grader: Get instant feedback on your papers to improve them.

Textero offers more than just writing and editing tools. It also ensures your work is unique and plagiarism-free: 

➤ Plagiarism Checker: Verify the originality of your written text in 7+ languages. 
➤ AI Detector: Identify content created by ChatGPT, Claude, and Bard.

5 reasons to choose Textero AI:

✅ Comprehensive AI writing tools: Receive detailed help at every stage of your writing process.
✅ Data security: Be sure your info and drafts are safe with advanced encryption and regular security checks.
✅ Real references: Get accurate citations from a database of over 215 million sources.
✅ Customizable text: Choose your paper type and writing style to suit your needs perfectly.
✅ Multilingual support: Create drafts in English, German, Italian, and more. 

How Textero AI for browser works:

First, click the “Add to Chrome” button. Once the writing tool is added to your browser, you can access our summarizer, try the research assistant, start a grammar check, and more.That’s it! You can start saving time immediately!

Feel free to share your experience or follow us for useful content here:
